Question
========
  
A study examines whether the degree of negative prejudice held by the parents (X) can serve as a predictor of the degree of negative prejudice held by the child (Y). This is measured with an interval-level questionnaire. The following data are found: sy = 2.10 r = .48 sx = 1.24

The standard error of prediction is:

----------
* 0.6
* 1.5
* 1.6
* 1.8
